name: Console Table
maker: Attributed to Pierre Deumier, After a design attributed to Victor Louis, and Jean-Louis Prieur
description: Console Table; Attributed to Pierre Deumier (French, active Paris 1760s), After a design attributed to Victor Louis (French, 1731 - 1807), and Jean-Louis Prieur (French, active 1765 - 1785); Paris, France; about 1765 - 1770; Silvered and gilt bronze; bleu turquin marble top; modern marbleized wood base; 83.5 x 129.5 x 52 cm (32 7/8 x 51 x 20 1/2 in.); 88.DF.118; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Console Table
medium: Silvered and gilt bronze; bleu turquin marble top; modern marbleized wood base
